ComicInfo.Penciller: Duncan Rouleau,Jim Royal,Val Mayerik,Jon Lewis,Arnold Pander,Duncan Rouleau,Jon Lewis,Arnold Pander
ComicInfo.Summary: This issue leads off with an all-new Predator story by House of Secrets writer Steve Seagle with X-Men artist Duncan Rouleau and Jim Royal! Plus, Arnold Pander and Zero Boy continue the legend of Jack Zero, the real-life, pulp-magazine gunfighter! And in Jon Lewis' "Outside, Inside," two socially inept twins discover life on two opposite planes -- the microscopic world of germs and the vastness of outer space. Both lead to trouble.
ComicInfo.Title: Bump in the Night; Outside, Inside; The Adventures of Jack Zero
ComicInfo.Writer: Arnold Pander,Steve Seagle,Duncan Rouleau,Jon Lewis,Zero Boy,Steve Seagle,Duncan Rouleau,Jon Lewis,Arnold Pander,Zero Boy
ComicInfo.Letterer: Sean Konot,Dave Cooper,John Costanza,Sean Konot,Dave Cooper,John Costanza
